top_comments.comment: It's always a pleasure dying in your videos
"You as the viewer." Yay, I finally made it to the credits of a music video!
These are getting better and better all the time!

comments_since_last_sample.body: Who would have thought pop-funk would translate to metal so well! The riffage! The three of you together is quite something! Making Phil Collins creepy...Hotel California... just...wow! MORE!
The subtle change for the original lyrics was a great touch.
Amazing! I was kinda wondering if it would work, and it really does! (Even has the staying power of the original, LOL)
